# Import libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

sessionInfo()

rm(list=ls())
```

# Import data

```{r}
gr.est <- readRDS("rdata.files/gr.final.cleaned.rds")
```

# Visualize

```{r}
gr.est %>%
  group_by(ASV, Soil, Amendment) %>%
  summarize(k_avg = mean(k)) %>% # average growth rate for each ASV
  mutate(Amendment = lvls_reorder(Amendment, 2:1)) %>%
  filter(Soil=="C3" & Amendment=="N") %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x=reorder(ASV, -k_avg), y=log(k_avg))) +
  theme_test() +
  theme(axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
        axis.text.x = element_blank())
  
```
